bug_report.summary: The application closes after attempt to edit the Note title on the start page
bug_report.description: If try to edit the Note title on the start page, the application stops working and closes

stepsToReproduce.step1: Tap on “New note” icon and enter the text
stepsToReproduce.step3: Tap a few seconds on the Note
stepsToReproduce.step4: Scroll down to “Edit title” item in pop-up menu

bug_report.actualResult: The application closes after attempt to edit the Note title on the start page
bug_report.expectedResult: The application continues working and Edit title field opens
